attributes.action: ensure that the purchase of a 17.9% stake in ITV by BSkyB is referred to the Competition Commission to ensure the plurality of the provision of TV news.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is to ensure that the government takes affirmative action to ensure that the media is not concentrated in the hands of the few.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
